data.title: Paranology 101 for Ghost Hunters at Fosterfields Living Historical Farm
data.meta_description: Discover What a Paranormal Investigation Takes from Start to FinishOn Saturday, Sept. 22 from 4 p.m. to Midnight, join veteran Paranormal Investigator Matthew J Haas for an evening of preserving history and educating the paranormal community at the Morris County Park...
data.text:
Published on September 15, 2018

Discover What a Paranormal Investigation Takes from Start to Finish

On Saturday, Sept. 22 from 4 p.m. to Midnight, join veteran Paranormal Investigator Matthew J Haas for an evening of preserving history and educating the paranormal community at the Morris County Park Commission's Fosterfields Living Historical Farm in Morris Township.

Explore the paranormal investigation process, and learn the fundamentals, research, terminology, ideology, and so much more. This hands-on course also includes a full investigation of The Willows, the 1854 Gothic Revival Mansion, once home to the Foster family.

Tickets are $65 per person. Preregistration is required, and spots are limited. To register, visit https://tinyurl.com/Paranology101. For more information, visit morrisparks.net, or email [email protected].

The Morris County Park Commission features one of the region's best park systems in the state of New Jersey. It currently protects and maintains 19,653 acres at 38 distinct sites plus offers a year-round calendar of events and activities for all to enjoy!
